Module it.polimi.ingsw.codexnaturalis
Package it.polimi.ingsw.codexnaturalis.model.game.components.cards

Class Card

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.codexnaturalis.model.game.components.cards.Card
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
GoldCard, InitialCard, ObjectiveCard, ResourceCard
public abstract class Card extends Object implements Serializable
Represents an abstract card in the game, providing common methods and properties for all card types. Extends Serializable to support object serialization.
